select count(*) from movie where sysdate-to_date(release,'YYYY/MM/DD')<30

select m.*, nvl(rate_avg,0) rate_avg from movie m, (select movie_num, nvl(avg(rate),0) rate_avg from rating group by movie_num) r where m.movie_num=r.movie_num(+) order by rate_avg desc
